pr_title: Updated docs for metadata to indicate no trailing or leading whitespace is allowed

timeline.message: Added policy to check metadata whitespace

timeline.bodyText: Thoughts on MetadataValidationPolicy? A little more generic and if we need to add more logic in the future the name will still be representative of what it does.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText:
Do we need to substring here? We aren't using the metadata key in the error message and we could just check:
boolean foundWhitespace = Character.isWhitespace(name.charAt(Constants.HeaderContants.X_MS_META.length())) || Character.isWhitespace(name.charAt(name.length() -1));
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
